member.name: M:Rambro.Awake
member.summary: Initializes the Rambro instance by marking it as a hero character before calling the base Awake method. This simple initialization reflects Rambro's nature as the starter hero with minimal customizations.

member.name: M:Rambro.FireWeapon(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Fires Rambro's weapon with visual bullet shell ejection effect. When attached to a zipline, adjusts gun sprite positioning. Rambro's simple firing behavior creates a shell casing effect and delegates actual projectile spawning to the base method.

member.name: F:Rambro.bulletShell
member.summary: Shrapnel prefab used to create bullet shell casing effects when firing. Ejected shells fly backward relative to Rambro's facing direction with realistic physics.
